name: Composers Tool Kit
tagline: A bit of software for contemporary music composers
body:
### Max/MSP
This software is created in the Max/MSP development environment.  It has quite a few advanced features.  It also has quite a few bugs.  Please let me know if you have any feature requests, I hope to continue development on this soon.


### Features
* automatic tone row to matrix generation, and serial operations
* set theory - with prime form, complement
* notes displayed on a treble clef staff
* MIDI playback of tone row and sets
* metronome with advanced functions
* saving!  save your favorite rows and sets

![program screenshot](http://www.mikesperone.com/images/max/CTK001.png)

### Running this patch
This patch is not yet available as a standalone app.  To run it, you need to get the (free) [Max Runtime Environment](https://cycling74.com/downloads/older/).  This was programmed in Max 6, it has not been tested in Max 7, but you are free to try.  It requires a few externals, including [bach](http://www.bachproject.net/home).


### Support or Contact
Please email me at mike@mikesperone.com if you are having any trouble.  This has not been updated in quite some time, but I hope to come back to it sometime this year (2016).
